item.title: EP 951 - The Blood Soaked Specter Of Dead Man's Canyon
item.itunes:title: The Blood Soaked Specter Of Dead Man's Canyon
item.description:
Today we go underground with the US Army to possibly fight reptilians, and then we travel to Dead Man’s Canyon in Colorado to meet a murderous yet friendly ghost!

 

Fan Art Friday Art by TVP VT U

 

Patreon
